mapper.sql: `userId` AS userId, `order_id` AS orderId, `fee` AS fee, `token` AS token, `amount` AS amount, `receiver_address` AS receiverAddress, `type` AS type, `operator` AS operator, `create_time` AS createTime, `update_time` AS updateTime
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM t_order WHERE
`userId` = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
`order_id` = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
`fee` = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND
`token` = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
`amount` = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND
`receiver_address` = #{receiverAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
`operator` = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
`create_time` = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND
`update_time` = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
